title: Dennis Hastert
summary: John Dennis Hastert (/ˈhæstərt/; born January 2, 1942) is an American former politician and convicted sex offender who represented Illinois's 14th congressional district from 1987 to 2007 and served as the 51st Speaker of the United States House of Representatives from 1999 to 2007.[1] The longest-serving Republican Speaker of the House in history, after the Democrats gained a majority in the House, he resigned and began to work as a lobbyist.
